name: scrabble charm necklace
description: This Scrabble inspired charm is slightly smaller than an actual scrabble tile and made of pure silver.  Order any letter of the alphabet with a personalized inscription on the back.  After you place the order I will email you and ask you which letter and what message you'd like on the reverse side. Chain is a 17 inch link chain (email me if you'd like it longer).  Each additional Scrabble charm is $35- there after.  I will bill you separately for additional charms. Please, email me at kritty@kritty.com if you have further questions.
